wikipedia_page.main: Garry Clark (born (1965-01-04)4 January 1965) is an English former professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1980s and 1990s. He played at representative level for Great Britain and England, and at club level for Hull Kingston Rovers, Scarborough Pirates and Hull FC, as a wing, i.e. number 2 or 5.
